gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pistons 118, Nets 112
gameRecap.excerpt: Detroit defeats Brooklyn, 118-112. For Detroit, Cade Cunningham led the way with 32 points, five rebounds, and 11 assists while Jaden Ivey added 34 points (six 3PM) in the victory. Dennis Schroder tallied 31 points and eight assists, while Lonnie Walker IV recorded 21 points and four rebounds for Brooklyn in the losing effort. Detroit improves to 10-52 on the season, while Brooklyn moves to 25-38 with the loss.
